H0.text: Irreversible enzyme inhibitors are toxins and poisons.

H1.text: Reversible toxins and poisons are enzyme inhibitors.

H2.text: Cancerous is the adjective describing toxins and poisons that are enzyme inhibitos.

H3.text: Observable are toxins and poisons that inhibit enzymes.

A4.text: Ricin is a catalytic irreversible inhibitor that inactivates ribosomes.

A5.text: The trypsin inhibitor is a protein that prevents trypsin activity detrimental to the pancreas.
